title: ISic002751. I.Sicily inscription 002751
body:
Facsimile Images

Στουδιῶ-
σε ((·)) χρηστ͡ὲ
χαῖρε ((·)) ἔζη-
σε ((·)) ἔτη ((·)) ξ´ ((ivy-leaf))
5λυδιαστής

Apparatus criticus

Text after Manganaro 1994

English translation

Farewell worthy Studiosos! He lived for 60 years after being a pastoral cantor.

Italian translation

Addio, degno Studiosos. Egli visse 60 anni essendo stato un cantore bucolico.

commentary
